title: Create FO-12 types, constants, and implementation provider
description:
## Objective

Create the FO-12 type definitions, constants, and implementation provider module.

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/2026-02-16-fo-12-spec.md — Sections: "Technical Architecture", "Exchange Structure", "File Structure"

## Scope

**Files to create:**
- app/fo-12/types.ts — Based on FO-11 types, add TARGET_LOVED=30, PHASE1_SIZE=10, PHASE2_SIZE=10 constants
- src/fo-12/index.ts — Re-exports ImplementationProvider, useImplementation, ImplementationSelector
- src/fo-12/implementation-context.tsx — Based on FO-11, queries 'fo-12' namespace instead of 'fo-11'
- src/fo-12/implementation-selector.tsx — Identical to FO-11

## Implementation

1. Copy app/fo-11/types.ts to app/fo-12/types.ts, rename all FO11 prefixes to FO12
2. Add constants: TARGET_LOVED = 30, PHASE1_SIZE = 10, PHASE2_SIZE = 10
3. Keep FO12_GOAL_QUESTION (same question text as FO-11)
4. Copy src/fo-11/ to src/fo-12/, change:
   - implementation-context.tsx: change getImplementations('fo-11') to getImplementations('fo-12')
   - All import paths: fo-11 to fo-12

## Tests

Verify: npx tsc --noEmit passes (type check)

Do NOT close until tests pass.
acceptance_criteria: npx tsc --noEmit passes with no FO-12 errors
closed_reason: Created FO-12 types, constants, and implementation provider. Files: app/fo-12/types.ts (TARGET_LOVED=30, PHASE1_SIZE=10, PHASE2_SIZE=10, FO12 types), src/fo-12/index.ts, src/fo-12/implementation-context.tsx (queries fo-12 namespace), src/fo-12/implementation-selector.tsx. npx tsc --noEmit passes with no FO-12 errors.
